location.sjis: プロスバンの町 住宅街階段

tl_file.dialogue:
エンガワを探しています 誰か売っているところ知りませんか？
I'm looking for dorsal fin meat Do you know where I can buy some?
# Enagawa usually pertains to dorssal fin muscle meat of flatfish, # But a sushi specialist site claims that it's more a generic term for # dorsal fin meat rather than flatfish specifically. # Link: https://sushiuniversity.jp/sushiblog/what-is-engawa/

dialogue.sjis: いいかげん気付きましょうよ
辛いものが大好きな人は ネコも好きらしいよ
dialogue.ascii: I think people who like spicy food like cats too!

dialogue.sjis: 町の外では多くのはぐれが出る 遠出する時は準備をおこたるな！
dialogue.ascii: There's a lot of Strays outside town! Be sure to prep well if you're venturing far out!
